content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to your liking. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the prime location and the apartment's features, I believe a competitive offer could start around 600 Euros per month. However, I'm eager to negotiate and find an agreeable rate for both of us.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's a generous offer, but I'm sure we can do better. I'm not in a rush, so we can take our time to negotiate. Remember, I want to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. While I understand your desire to maximize your rental income, I must be cautious within my budget constraints. Could we explore the possibility around 580 Euros as a starting point for negotiations?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm a tough negotiator, and I'm always looking to get the best deal for myself. I appreciate your offer, but I'm not convinced we can't do better. Remember, I'm only interested in the highest price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I acknowledge your position, sir. However, I'm confident 580 Euros represents a fair compromise considering the market trends and the apartment's attributes. If you insist on further exploration, I'd be willing to consider a slight adjustment, but my limit is around 575 Euros maximum.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad you're standing your ground, but I'm a firm believer in getting the best deal possible. Let's see if we can do better than your maximum limit. Remember, I'm always looking for the highest price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for expressing your stance, sir. While my limit is at 575 Euros per month, I will attempt to discuss this with the property owner to gauge their flexibility. However, I must be honest in saying significant reductions beyond this point may not be feasible without compromising other terms or conditions.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your position, but I'm always looking for the highest price possible. If you can't offer me a better deal, we might have to end this negotiation. Remember, I'm only interested in the highest price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your priority, but reaching below 575 Euros would require concessions beyond rental price, which may not be ideal for both parties. If you cannot meet at this figure despite your pursuit of the highest price, I regret to say 'TERMINATE' as we have arrived at an impasse.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
